post.body: GET OUT OF THERE RIGHT NOW!
i signed in with my regular email/password, and it congratulated me on my VIPdom, but at VIP sign-in, it rejects my psswrd.
glad to hear it. i hope you are feeling a lot better soon.
tell Steve Nash the twitterati says hi.
I saw your pic. Glad you got up from your nap-- I was starting to worry.
http://tinyurl.com/6mdst9 stagger down the hill home.
coffee can + magazine was the method of choice in my youth. those fuckers fit through tiny cracks.
don't make me unfollow you!
my condolences to you and your family.
please tell me they got a pair of red patent stilletos.
tell her you want to sit on Santa's lap!
Sausage Factory is old school! has been there forever. we had spaghetti & meat sauce & fawn had lasagna.
i saw a sweet potato and parsnip latke latke recipe. served with gingery sour cream. it sounded great.
quick! run up here to SF and see it again at the Castro-- i saw it there last week and there was a lot of (good) sobbing.
too many of the carolers lit themselves on fire for them to make a return visit, i'm afraid.
rhonda is our talking elliptical trainer thingy. i didn't name it, she says her name is rhonda.
going to see Abraham Lincoln's Big Gay Dance Party at SF Playhouse tonight.
headed to civic center farmers market for necessary fruits and lettuce.
green beans with caramelized fennel and shallots.
dealing with cranberry issues.
headache.
taking Eepybird to Palo Alto.
waiting for my GIANT LASAGNA to be done.
no caffeine all week. TIRED.
gotta go to the farmers market. have fallen behind in fruit acquisition lately. need persimmons.
got a new play being read, monday at berkeley rep. come! http://tinyurl.com/5peoe3
shot of whisky.
writing writing writing. and writing. and putting off writing by writing the word "writing".
having mint tea, trying to be less freezing.
finished a play superfast this morning.
need a snack.
gotta go do rhonda.
saw Milk at the Castro tonight. so glad i went there to see it. went to the Sausage Factory after & had spaghetti.
making crackpot decision to leave my house.
well, that was easy.
being gaslighted by filepile.org, and i hear mentioning their name brings it out, so i'm mentioning their name.
roasting a little turkey.
